title: Write Gherkin scenarios for tsk close and delete
description: Scenarios for: close issue, delete issue, delete with children error, delete with dependencies warning.
creator: Ryan Alyn Porter

comments.author: Ryan Alyn Porter
comments.text: Goal: write Gherkin scenarios for tsk close and tsk delete. Acceptance: close sets status closed and closed_at, delete removes issue, missing issue errors, all @wip.
